channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 22:50 Air alarm to Cherkasy Oblast Watch Further Messages.

Consider that anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-mirovskaya territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk.
